testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page.......................................passed When the user enters the username "student"...............................passed And the user enters the password "Password123"............................passed And the user clicks on the login button...................................passed Then the user should see a success message................................passed

testcase.name: Unsuccessful login with missing username
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page.......................................passed When the user enters the username ""......................................passed And the user enters the password "Test@123"...............................passed And the user clicks on the login button...................................passed Then the login attempt should fail........................................passed And the user should see a username required error.........................passed

testcase.name: Unsuccessful login with missing password
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page.......................................passed When the user enters the username "student"...............................passed And the user enters the password "".......................................passed And the user clicks on the login button...................................passed Then the login attempt should fail........................................passed And the user should see a password required error.........................passed

testcase.name: Unsuccessful login with missing username and password
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page.......................................passed When the user enters the username ""......................................passed And the user enters the password "".......................................passed And the user clicks on the login button...................................passed Then the login attempt should fail........................................passed And the user should see a username and password required error............passed
